title: Vaculin
author: Vaculin
content: I like to interview you guys to know more about your experience in sports betting. With this, I think we can help those newbies on what to expect and what to do in order to stay entertain in sports betting. So please follow this format of question.1- How long have you been gambling in sports?Ans ; 2 -What are your worst experience in sports betting?Ans ; 3-What are your best experience in sports betting?Ans ;4-What can you advise on the new gamblers and those who struggles in sports betting?Ans ;

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Vaculin on December 09, 2023, 01:33:38 PM1- How long have you been gambling in sports?I remember the day vividly. I did not know about bitcoin, crypto and forum at the time. I went to my bank ATM to fund my betting account and I gambled that day. That was February 2nd, 2014.Quote from: Vaculin on December 09, 2023, 01:33:38 PM2 -What are your worst experience in sports betting?I used huge amount to gamble several times and I lost. I had seen gambling as a way to earn again. I used my MSc money to gamble at the time and I felt like killing myself after I lost all. Not on a single bet but several bets for several days.Quote from: Vaculin on December 09, 2023, 01:33:38 PM3-What are your best experience in sports betting?A day that I gambled that I did not lose but won throughout the day. It was unbelievable but it is the truth. I lost the money the following day.Quote from: Vaculin on December 09, 2023, 01:33:38 PM4-What can you advise on the new gamblers and those who struggles in sports betting?To have a gambling budget, which should be small, like 5% of weekly income and not going beyond it. They should gamble with the amount of money they can afford to lose.I want to make money from gambling. That was what got me addicted. Looking for strategies to win, but realizing I am losing more than winning. My experience that time was so awful. I remember that I sold my spoit laptop and home theater to gamble and lost the money. It would have been better if I repair the laptop.I remember I gambled with my school fee money but my dad gave me another one before I graduated. Gamblers should not see gambling as a way of making money. If they see it that way, they should not use more than the amount that they can afford to lose. Gambling should be for fun and nothing more.I had a bad past experiences about gambling which I will not wish anyone to experience. And that is why we are here to discuss about ways not to be addicted or lose huge amount on gambling.

Quote2 -What are your worst experience in sports betting?My worst experience have also become my most frequent experience,  and that is,  not being able to take a break when I win a big amount,  because I always continued to bet more and eventually lose all again but that has changed recently with a new approach. Answer Bet on sport which is famous in your country since you can easily read some information about them also you can get easily some latest news and this is so helpful especially when betting on that league.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: -as far as I remember, when I was still in school, I was already betting on sports and even other types of betting.-worst betting experience was when I bet using my friend money and at time I promised my friend that I would share the results but it turned out that my bet lost and we became enemies.-best experience in sports betting at that time was that I used $50 for a single bet on football and had a winning streak until my bankroll accumulated to over $400.-the best advice is to bet according to your abilities and dont be tempted by very high odds or dont make large parlay bets if you can not accept the risk and if its just for fun it better to choose a single bet which has a lower risk and you will get pleasure while bet and then watch the match.and the last suggestion is dont use a large budget, this is just for fun.

comments.body: Quote from: Vaculin on December 09, 2023, 01:33:38 PM1- How long have you been gambling in sports?Ans ; 2 -What are your worst experience in sports betting?Ans ; 3-What are your best experience in sports betting?Ans ;4-What can you advise on the new gamblers and those who struggles in sports betting?Ans ; 1. I have being in sportbet for more than five years now as that was the game that I used to start gambling for the first time.2. My worst experience was the day that I was suppose to win $1000 with just $3, because it was up to 20 games on my slip and 19 games came out as predicted, which I was called for cash out but I rejected the offer because I thought that I was a genius and I will win the cash. But to my greatest surprise, the last game played out differently and it cut my slip.3. comments.author: EluguHcman
comments.body: Quote from: Vaculin on December 09, 2023, 01:33:38 PM1- How long have you been gambling in sports?I am an occasional sports gambler because sometimes ago I developed some sorts of love for a football team, it really caused me lot of damage such as the emotional breakdown when my clubs looses a match especially to a lower team that is almost a 99% sure of winning and also when my club looses against a strong oppositions (enemies) because I have some friends who are my opposite fans club so we just have disagreements within each other after games played. So just can't telling how long I have been betting on sports due to my instabilities and unseriousness about it.Quote from: Vaculin on December 09, 2023, 01:33:38 PM2 -What are your worst experience in sports betting?My worse experience is that I betted with my last fund from my gambling budgets portfolio and was at a point of 100% believe that I was going to double take(profits) from my stake because I predicted a bigger team to win the match.Along the lines I was on the safe winning side not til a minute (1mins) to end up the match so I can count my bet winning then the match was equalized which compromised my prediction and in not more than 10 seconds the match ended and I lost.I was very much upset about it because I had no more more for funding and believe me, I would had gone against my gambling budgets if I had more money with me then because I felt like... Oh no, the mistake can be corrected if I can bet again.Quote from: Vaculin on December 09, 2023, 01:33:38 PM3-What are your best experience in sports betting?And my best experience is contrarily to my worse experienced where I recovered my losts of the day with the last fund from my gambling budgets.And the sweetest part of it is that my prediction was for for either the small team to win due to a home playing advantage or the both teams are drawn in the match.It is my best sports bets experience because I was then going through some financial difficulties at that period and then, i was able to recover a full day of my gambling budgets on that match.Just so cool, I walked away and didn't bet in some period of time because I needed to fix my finances up.Quote from: Vaculin on December 09, 2023, 01:33:38 PM4-What can you advise on the new gamblers and those who struggles in sports betting? There is no specific advice for specifically for a sports bets unless one wants to to be enhanced with sports gambling skills.Otherwise in general terms of advise, you must learn to draft a gambling budget and must be dependent on your incomes so that you don't have most of your incomes spent on gambling like you are funding to an investment or trading or like you are investing on a carrier.Imagine at my worsen experience if I have got more money to stake after I ran out of funds from my gambling budgets, alternatively I am still liable to loose as loosed others.So I urged you to bet responsibly and must not be overwhelmed with emotional breakdown for loosing or cheering for winning.Learn to Walk away from the gambling board at when due.Since I lost impressions from sports gambling because I don't go watching live sports anymore, but since then, if I must bet on sports bets, I make sure of rallying a careful research to tracking of the teams records and also considering of the games odds so as it is also where the risks as lied.That is my best of advise Incase you are not one of the usual sportive events fan (gambler) like me. It basically helps to guide you at sport's bets predictions and also of your responsible gambling timelines.

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: 1- How long have you been gambling in sports?Ans ; I'm new to sports betting and I spend most of my time gambling on just a few casino games, but if I'm honest, I prefer playing soccer betting for now, so I'm learning it slowly.2 -What are your worst experience in sports betting?Ans ; My bad experience was playing safe with low odds of 1.10 or 1.20 and to be honest without knowledge it turns out that playing safe with bets like that doesn't guarantee risk-free and always gives you a win, stupidly I didn't know much information about what I was betting on.3-What are your best experience in sports betting?Ans ; Every defeat I experience becomes an experience for me to slowly learn to be a wiser gambler, that's why failure is my best experience when gambling on sports betting.4-What can you advise on the new gamblers and those who struggles in sports betting?Ans ; Never try to bet on sports betting if you don't have experience and know a lot of information about the sport you are betting on, it will only waste your money because you are playing for safety or looking for luck by just looking at the odds, it doesn't really guarantee any win. My advice is to gamble with what you know and don't try to gamble with feeling.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: Vaculin on December 09, 2023, 01:33:38 PMI like to interview you guys to know more about your experience in sports betting. With this, I think we can help those newbies on what to expect and what to do in order to stay entertain in sports betting. So please follow this format of question.Experienced gamblers have the responsibility to assist newbies as the learn and understand the nitty gritty of gambling. So I am happy to be part of this survey as much as it is targeted at assisting new gamblers. Quote1- How long have you been gambling in sports?Ans ; I have been an active gambler for above six years, but I have less than three years in crypto gambling.Quote2 -What are your worst experience in sports betting?Ans ; My worst experience was when I was convinced by a friend that some bet numbers were from an insider. This motivated me to use my entire wage to stake. And it turned out to be fake numbers because I lost the game. Quote3-What are your best experience in sports betting?Ans ;When I won big during the COVID-19 lockdown. Due to the lockdowns, many people lost their source of income and I had no means of earning to buy food for my family. The win helped me to stock my house with food in preparation for a two-week lockdown in my location. Quote4-What can you advise on the new gamblers and those who struggles in sports betting?Ans ; Gambling shouldn't be seen as a full-time or part-time job because wins are unpredictable. Newbies should see gambling as entertainment and not a source of income. They should also use only funds they can afford to lose on gambling.

comments.body: 1- How long have you been gambling in sports?Ive been dabbling in sports gambling for around 5 years now. I started small, just for kicks, but I've gradually gotten more into it.2 -What are your worst experience in sports betting?Oh, man, Ive definitely had some rough goes - this one time stands out when I lost a chunk of change on a game I just knew in my bones was a sure thing.  I was straight up devastated.  But hey, live and learn when it comes to bankroll management.  3-What are your best experience in sports betting?There was this one killer parlay hit that had me over the moon and  i'm talking a serious jackpot.  That rush is what keeps me coming back to lay down a few bets here and there. 4-What can you advise on the new gamblers and those who struggles in sports betting?The way I see it it's entertainment first and foremost.  You gotta ask yourself - am I having a good time?
